detailed_info.name: DMDM hydantoin
detailed_info.description:
DMDM Hydantoin is used as a preservative in cosmetics and acts against fungi, yeasts and bacteria. It is a liberator of formaldehyde (formol). It is used in shampoos, skin care products, hair products, makeup, conditioners and make-up removers. It is also found in many other consumer products such as herbicides, latex paints, polishes, stripping oils, adhesives, photocopy paper or inks.
A formaldehyde liberator is a compound that slowly releases formaldehyde (formol), a molecule considered to be CMR.
detailed_info.regulation: The maximum concentration allowed in ready-to-use cosmetic preparations is 0.6%.

functions.name: Preservative
functions.description: Inhibits the development of microorganisms in cosmetic products.
